title: Enjoy the stunning sunset views and beautiful river.
posting_body: Stunning sunset views and beautiful river from this newly updated 31st floor condo.

The open and spacious floor plan features a kitchen with quartz counters, including stainless steel appliances and large center island, large living room flowing to the dining area, master bedroom with walk-in closet, full bathroom with double sinks and convenient main floor washer and dryer included.
Enjoy downtown living at it's finest with all the amenities offered with the association including pool, fitness center, tennis outdoor sports deck and much more.
C0nveniently located minutes from restaurants, local markets, boutiques and more!
